languages.text: "Я не... Кхм, мне многое известно о бронетехнике и тактиках ведения наземного боя. В теории". {n}Девушка осторожно кивает.{/n} "Сегодня я перейду к практике, если это необходимо".
"I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."
languages.original_text: "Я не... Кхм, мне многое известно о бронетехнике и тактиках ведения наземного боя. В теории". {n}Девушка осторожно кивает.{/n} "Сегодня я перейду к практике, если это необходимо".

traits.locale_text: "I am not... Ahem, I know a lot about armored vehicles and ground combat tactics. In theory." {n}The young woman nods cautiously.{/n} "Today I will move on to practice if you deem it necessary."
"I am not... Ahem, I know a lot about armored vehicles and ground combat tactics. In theory." {n}The young woman nods cautiously.{/n} "Today I will move on to practice if you deem it necessary."
"I am not... Ahem, I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}The young woman nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

"I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."
"I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

languages.text: «No estoy... Sé mucho sobre vehículos acorazados y tácticas de combate terrestre... en teoría». {n}Cassia asiente con cautela.{/n} «Hoy lo pondré en práctica, si lo considera necesario».
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: «No estoy... Sé mucho sobre vehículos acorazados y tácticas de combate terrestre... en teoría». {n}Cassia asiente con cautela.{/n} «Hoy lo pondré en práctica, si lo considera necesario».

languages.text: “我没试过……我对装甲车与地面作战战术非常了解，但仅限于理论知识。”{n}卡西娅谨慎地点着头。{/n}“如果你认为有必要的话，我今天可以进行实践。”
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: “我没试过……我对装甲车与地面作战战术非常了解，但仅限于理论知识。”{n}卡西娅谨慎地点着头。{/n}“如果你认为有必要的话，我今天可以进行实践。”

languages.text: 「あたくしはそんな…あたくしは装甲車両や地上の軍略について理論的にたくさん知っておりますけど」{n}カシアは慎重に頷く。{/n}「必要であれば、今日が実践に移るときですわ」
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしはそんな…あたくしは装甲車両や地上の軍略について理論的にたくさん知っておりますけど」{n}カシアは慎重に頷く。{/n}「必要であれば、今日が実践に移るときですわ」

languages.text: {n}Cassia acquiesce prudemment.{/n} « Eh bien... J'en connais un rayon sur les véhicules blindés et les tactiques de combat au sol, encore qu'en théorie seulement. Cela étant dit, je suis prête à passer à la pratique dès aujourd'hui si vous le jugez nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia acquiesce prudemment.{/n} « Eh bien... J'en connais un rayon sur les véhicules blindés et les tactiques de combat au sol, encore qu'en théorie seulement. Cela étant dit, je suis prête à passer à la pratique dès aujourd'hui si vous le jugez nécessaire. »

languages.text: "Ben... Zırhlı araçlar ve kara çatışma taktikleri hakkında çok şey biliyorum ama teoride." {n}Cassia, ihtiyatla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sen gerekli görürsen bugün pratiğini de görmüş olurum."
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Zırhlı araçlar ve kara çatışma taktikleri hakkında çok şey biliyorum ama teoride." {n}Cassia, ihtiyatla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sen gerekli görürsen bugün pratiğini de görmüş olurum."

languages.text: "Nein ... ich weiß eine Menge über Panzerfahrzeuge und Bodentaktiken ... in der Theorie." {n}Cassia nickt vorsichtig.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr es für nötig haltet, setze ich mein Wissen heute in die Praxis um."
languages.original_text: "I am not— I know a lot about armoured vehicles and ground combat tactics — in theory." {n}Cassia nods cautiously.{/n} "Today, I will move on to practice, if you deem it necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Nein ... ich weiß eine Menge über Panzerfahrzeuge und Bodentaktiken ... in der Theorie." {n}Cassia nickt vorsichtig.{/n} "Aber wenn Ihr es für nötig haltet, setze ich mein Wissen heute in die Praxis um."
